name: cleanread
description: Chrome extension to make webpages more readable for people with dyslexia

scripts.copy-assets: npm run copy-manifest && npm run copy-html && npm run copy-css && npm run copy-fonts
scripts.copy-html: copy popup.html dist\ && copy options.html dist\
scripts.copy-css: copy popup.css dist\ && copy options.css dist\ && xcopy src\content\styles dist\content\styles /E /I
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && powershell Compress-Archive -Path * -DestinationPath ..\cleanread-extension.zip

author: CleanRead Team
